text: unhonne to paraspar ek-doosare par zyaadatee karane ke uddeshy se isake pashchaat vibhed kiya ki unake paas gyaan aa chuka tha. aur yadi tumhaare rab kee or se ek niyat avadhi tak ke lie baat pahale nishchit na ho chukee hotee to unake beech faisala chuka diya gaya hota. kintu jo log unake pashchaat kitaab ke vaaris hue ve usakee or se ek ulajhan mein daal denevaale sandeh mein pade hue hai
